kerala-tour-with-alleppey-backwaters-3n-.tagline: Discover Enchanting Kerala: Explore Culture & Landscapes - 4 Days Tour
kerala-tour-with-alleppey-backwaters-3n-.title: 4 Days Short Trip To Kerala With Alleppey Backwaters
kerala-tour-with-alleppey-backwaters-3n-.highlights: Embark on a magical journey through the captivating landscapes of Kerala with our Kerala Tour Packages. This carefully curated itinerary allows you to immerse yourself in the rich cultural heritage, scenic beauty, and serene backwaters of this picturesque South Indian state. Dive into the vibrant history of Kochi with a sightseeing tour that takes you to the exquisite Santa Cruz Cathedral, known for its gothic architecture and Portuguese-inspired interiors. Explore the colonial charm of Fort Kochi, adorned with captivating colonial buildings. Indulge in a shopping spree at the renowned Lulu International Shopping Mall, where you can find a plethora of local treasures.Next, journey to the breathtaking hill station of Munnar, a haven of tranquility surrounded by lush greenery. En route, you'll witness the awe-inspiring beauty of the Cheeyappara Waterfalls, cascading down in magnificent tiers. Marvel at the picturesque Mattupetty Dam, framed by verdant rolling hills. Upon reaching Munnar, settle into your hotel and unwind amidst the serene ambiance of this enchanting destination.The highlight of your trip awaits as you proceed to Alleppey, known as the "Venice of the East," famous for its serene backwaters. Glide along the tranquil waters on a traditional houseboat, marveling at the scenic landscapes, swaying palms, and charming villages that line the banks. Indulge in a leisurely evening, capturing the mesmerizing sunset over the backwaters, creating an ambiance of serenity and tranquility.
